actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to provide a program for honoring industry and other private efforts to contribute to the maintenance and enhancement of environmental quality.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a program for honoring industry and other private efforts to contribute to the maintenance and enhancement of environmental quality. Authorizes the appropriation of $100,000 for fiscal year 1973, and for each fiscal year thereafter, to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide a program for honoring industry and other private efforts to contribute to the maintenance and enhancement of environmental quality.
